pullRequest.title: Improve remote logging
pullRequest.bodyText:
First commit targets this error
Second commit targets this error
Third commit is a little bit of cleanup. There's a lot more to do but at least this is a start around where I was anyway.
What has been done to verify that this works as intended?
Compiled and ran.
Why is this the best possible solution? Were any other approaches considered?
No big alternatives here.
How does this change affect users? Describe intentional changes to behavior and behavior that could have accidentally been affected by code changes. In other words, what are the regression risks?
No changes intended. There's a bit of refactoring in the task that loads a blank form and the code specifically that loads a form from cache.
Do we need any specific form for testing your changes? If so, please attach one.
No.
Does this change require updates to documentation? If so, please file an issue here and include the link below.
No.
Before submitting this PR, please make sure you have:

 run ./gradlew checkAll and confirmed all checks still pass OR confirm CircleCI build passes and run ./gradlew connectedDebugAndroidTest locally.
 verified that any code or assets from external sources are properly credited in comments and/or in the about file.
 verified that any new UI elements use theme colors. UI Components Style guidelines

commit.message: Add logging for form cache errors
Add logging for failure to load instance

nodes.bodyText: Do we need readCache() and deserializeFormDef() looks like the same code is duplicated in javarosa org.javarosa.benchmarks.utils.FormDefCache?
